raw_body: Beloved son of late Desmond and Bertha, loving husband of Durgha (nee Weerasekera), beloved father of Damian, Tashmi and Jason, loving brother of Sandra and Tania, father- in-law of Peshani. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 3.15 p.m. today, Thursday 21st for cremation to the General Cemetery, Kanatte at 3.30 p.m. 362958
